about_the_game:
Bad Pad soundtrack by Avishay Mizrav.
Including 52 minutes of music in 26 different tracks. All tracks are recorded in high-quality mp3 format.

Credits:
Avishay Mizrav of Headbang Games - All music, mixing, guitars, bass, keyboards and drums programming.
Jeremiah Kelly of UnderGunned Productions - Vocals on Bad Pad - Theme, Prologue, The great battle, Past future tension, Evil Pen's evil plans, The final stand off, Epilogue.
Christina Rotondo - Vocals on Hexa's nightmare.
Amit Sh. - Additional composition and keyboards on Analog's digital ride
